stories.text:
Say I want to build a TUI app using React Blessed or ink, I want then to share code with someone to run it and see the results live, like codesandbox with web pages.

Is there such a website?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there any alternative to Codesandbox for TUI's?
Okta’s Investigation of the January 2022 Compromise

stories.text:
Real Estate in USA

I'm hoping to be a first time home buyer in the next two years, and I'm wondering if hot markets now are complete nonsense from a 20-30 year perspective. Is there any reputable business that will look at a potential purchase and give me figures on what it could like like by the time my mortgage is paid off? Is it possible for them to estimate what insurance rates will be over that time as well?
stories.title: Ask HN: Where Can I Get a Comprehensive Climate Analysis for Real Estate?
MacPaw’s Operations Amidst the Russian Aggression Against Ukraine
